about_the_game:
CUBE is a minimalist tower defense Roguelike game.

[Game Background]

You are the only one who can operate the tower! Stay nearby to keep it powered up to destroy the hordes of enemies trying to knock it down.

[Game Features]

By combining the elements of minimalist tower defense + Roguelike, a unique gaming experience is created

1. Upgrade the tower, upgrade yourself!

Leave the comfort of the tower to collect resources to upgrade the tower, weapons, and players.

2. Upgrade enemies! ?

After each wave, you must choose which enemies to face next and how to upgrade them. If you want to succeed, you must choose carefully.

3. Survive? Survive?

You will encounter an indescribable BOSS later, please don't be afraid.
